---
title: "LA Data Cleaning"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
df_la <- Cities %>% filter(stateusps == 'CA')
```


```{r}
df_la <- df_la %>% mutate(group = ifelse(county_code == "LA", "city", "suburb")) %>%
  select(group, everything())
```


```{r}
df_la_2015 <- df_la %>% filter(year == "2015")
```
